item.title: How To Create Google Sitemap
item.description: How To Create Google Sitemap in Ubuntu 20.04 Today we will learn how to create Google Sitemap. Google Sitemap is very important because you need to do page ranking with Google Sitemap. Sitemap is a type of mapping where there will be links to all the pages of your website. You can easily create a sitemap on the Linux operating system. With Sitemap you can crawl any website online, but WordPress site php coding.
